alert.note: Alert for Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 29 at 9:23PM EDT until October 30 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, except up to 8 inches of snow accumulation is possible around Twin Lakes. * WHERE...Northern Houghton County. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. The evening commute will also be impacted around Houghton. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Through Monday morning, the heaviest and most frequent snow showers will occur south of Painesdale. During Monday afternoon, the heavier snow showers will begin to shift north, reaching the Houghton and Calumet areas in the late afternoon. Snow intensity may increase during Monday night, so stay tuned to the latest forecasts for updates regarding snowfall.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
